fast3d.util.serial

Class F3ObjExporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • fast3d.util.serial.F3ObjExporter

  • public class F3ObjExporter
extends java.lang.Object
    the counterpart to fast3d.util.serial.F3ObjImporter to shrink file sizes of .obj-files
    Author:
    Tim Trense

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.Exception exception
      if an exception occurred
      boolean hardCompress
      whether to compress the data - may force loss of accuracy
      default is false

      constructs a new exporter to save the scene

      • F3ObjExporter

        public F3ObjExporter(Scene scn,
                     java.io.File file,
                     boolean hardCompress)
        constructs a new exporter to save the scene
        Parameters:
        scn - the scene to export
        file - the .f3obj-file to export to
        hardCompress - whether to compress the data (may lead to lack of accuracy - default is false)
